description: Gets the subscription grant in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the subscription grant exists.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: assets
nested_items.description: The assets for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetScope
nested_items.description: The asset scope of the subscribed asset.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The asset ID of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: filterIds
nested_items.description: The filter IDs of the asset scope.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: failureCause
nested_items.description: The failure cause included in the details of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The description of the error message.

nested_items.name: failureTimestamp
nested_items.description: The failure timestamp included in the details of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: grantedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription grant to the asset is created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: targetName
nested_items.description: The target name of the asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the subscription grant exists.

nested_items.name: grantedEntity
nested_items.description: The entity to which the subscription is granted.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: An identifier of a revision of an asset published in a Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The details of a revision of an asset published in a Amazon DataZone catalog.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: subscriptionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the subscription.

nested_items.name: subscriptionTargetId
nested_items.description: The subscription target ID associated with the subscription grant.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription grant was upated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the subscription grant.
